com.foreach.across.core.context.registry

Interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAcrossContextBeanRegistry

    public interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
    Provides access to all BeanFactories present in an AcrossContext.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BEAN 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getBean(String beanName)
      Get a bean registered under the given name in the AcrossContext.
      <T> T getBeanFromModule(String moduleName, String beanName)
      Get a bean registered under the given name from the ApplicationContext of the given module.
      <T> T getBeanOfType(Class<T> requiredType)
      Searches the across context for a bean of the given type.
      <T> T getBeanOfTypeFromModule(String moduleName, Class<T> requiredType)
      Searches the ApplicationContext of the specific module for a bean of the given type.
      <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(Class<T> beanClass)
      Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry.
      <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(Class<T> beanClass, boolean includeModuleInternals)
      Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry.
      <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(org.springframework.core.ResolvableType resolvableType, boolean includeModuleInternals)
      Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry.

      Determine the type for the bean registered under the given name in the module ApplicationContext.
      String getContextId() 
      String getFactoryName()
      The factory name is the unique bean name under which the registry can be found.

    • Method Detail

      • getContextId

        String getContextId()
        Returns:
        The unique id of the AcrossContext this registry represents.

      • getFactoryName

        String getFactoryName()
        The factory name is the unique bean name under which the registry can be found.
        Returns:
        The unique name of this AcrossContextBeanRegistry.

      • getBean

        Object getBean(String beanName)
        Get a bean registered under the given name in the AcrossContext.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Instance.

      • getBeanType

        Class<?> getBeanType(String beanName)
        Determine the type for the bean registered under the given name in the AcrossContext.
        Parameters:
        beanName - Name of the bean definition.
        Returns:
        Type if it could be resolved.

      • getBeanFromModule

        <T> T getBeanFromModule(String moduleName,
                      String beanName)
        Get a bean registered under the given name from the ApplicationContext of the given module.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module.
        beanName - Name of the bean definition.
        Returns:
        Instance.

      • getBeanTypeFromModule

        Class<?> getBeanTypeFromModule(String moduleName,
                             String beanName)
        Determine the type for the bean registered under the given name in the module ApplicationContext.
        Parameters:

        beanName - Name of the bean definition.
        Returns:
        Type if it could be resolved.

      • getBeanOfType

        <T> T getBeanOfType(Class<T> requiredType)
        Searches the across context for a bean of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the matching bean.
        Parameters:
        requiredType - Type the bean should match.
        Returns:
        Bean found. Exception is thrown if none is found.

      • getBeanOfTypeFromModule

        <T> T getBeanOfTypeFromModule(String moduleName,
                            Class<T> requiredType)
        Searches the ApplicationContext of the specific module for a bean of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the matching bean.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module.
        requiredType - Type the bean should match.
        Returns:
        Bean found. Exception is thrown if none is found.

      • getBeansOfType

        <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(Class<T> beanClass)
        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. This includes beans from ancestors, but does not include module internal beans.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        ModuleBeanOrderComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfType

        <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(Class<T> beanClass,
                         boolean includeModuleInternals)
        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        ModuleBeanOrderComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfType

        <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(org.springframework.core.ResolvableType resolvableType,
                         boolean includeModuleInternals)
        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values. This method allows looking for beans having specific generic parameters.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        resolvableType - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        ModuleBeanOrderComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered
